nodes.text: The Temple Valley was a valley that was located on the planet Endregaad. It contained a number of rock formations, as well as various pre-fabricated units and decommissioned vehicles, that were abandoned by geode miners that were active in the area. Following a viral outbreak on Endregaad in 19 ABY, the world's inhabitants blamed the disease on non-Humans and, to evade their wrath, the Hutt Mika Anjiliac Chiera and his entourage of Niktos took shelter at an encampment in the Temple Valley, next to the remains of a crashed YV-100 light freighter.
